suite.name: script_0001_Medicinal product reference set (929360061000036106) content validation

test.name: 01 Medicinal product reference set (929360061000036106) is populated
03 All active references are from module 900062011000036108 [Australian Medicines Terminology module]

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.simplerefset_<SNAPSHOT> WHERE refsetId = 929360061000036106 AND moduleId != 900062011000036108;

test.name: 04 FSN is 'Medicinal product reference set (foundation metadata concept)'

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active WHERE conceptId = 929360061000036106 AND typeId = 900000000000003001 AND term = 'Medicinal product reference set (foundation metadata concept)' and id != 965507121000036119;

test.name: 05 PT (in ADRS) is 'Medicinal product reference set'

parameter.name: description
parameter.value: query returns 1 if the string matches, otherwise 0

test.name: 06 Only active descriptions are the expected PT and FSN

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: SELECT * FROM <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active WHERE conceptId = 929360061000036106 AND term != 'Medicinal product reference set (foundation metadata concept)' AND term != 'Medicinal product reference set' AND term != 'MP (medicinal product) reference set';

test.name: 07 Foundation refset IS A child of 446609009 | Simple type reference set
08 Foundation refset only has parent 446609009 | Simple type reference set

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_active where sourceId = 929360061000036106 and typeId = 116680003 and destinationId not in (446609009);

test.name: 09 Only Contains Active descendants of Medicinal product

parameter.name: query

test.name: 10 Does not contain any descendants of the other 6 boxes (non-MP)

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.simplerefset_active where refsetId = 929360061000036106 and ( isDescendentOf_cr(referencedComponentid,30513011000036104) OR isDescendentOf_cr(referencedComponentid,30450011000036109) OR isDescendentOf_cr(referencedComponentid,30560011000036108) OR isDescendentOf_cr(referencedComponentid,30404011000036106) OR isDescendentOf_cr(referencedComponentid,30425011000036101) OR isDescendentOf_cr(referencedComponentid,30537011000036101) );

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_active where not isActiveMemberOf_cr_refset(id,929360061000036106) and isDescendentOf_cr(id,30497011000036103) and NOT isKindOf_cr(id,30450011000036109);
